product_name: AveneHyaluron Activ B3 Triple Action Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAvene's Hyaluron Activ B3 Triple Action Eye Cream helps firm, revitalize and reduce the appearance of dark circles around the eye contour. Formulated for the delicate eye area to smooth the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles while improving elasticity.
details: DetailsBenefitsImmediately refreshes and decongests the eye contourHelps reduce visible wrinkles and fine lines while brighteningSmoothes fine lines and firms the delicate eye areaUnique, silky gel texture specifically designed to massage into the delicate eye contour without tugging or pulling93% ingredients of natural originExcellent skin tolerance, good eye toleranceKey Ingredients6% Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, helps improve skin barrier function and evens skin toneHyaluronic Acid locks in moisture to replenish skin hydrationDextran Sulfate helps reduce the appearance of dark circles and signs of fatigueAvene Thermal Spring Water is clinically proven by 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm skinResearch ResultsDark circles reduced by 10%Immediate Boost of Hydration by +85%Hydrates for 24 HoursItem 2615680How To UseApply to the eye contour area in the morning and/or evening. Also suitable for the lip contour.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsAvene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Glycerin. Niacinamide. Dicaprylyl Ether. Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil). Myristyl Alcohol. Sodium Dextran Sulfate. Sodium Hyaluronate. Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract. Adenosine. Cetearyl Olivate. Citric Acid. Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Powder (Citrus Limon Peel Powder). Glyceryl Behenate. Glyceryl Dibehenate. Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil). Myristyl Glucoside. Sclerotium Gum. Sodium Benzoate. Sorbitan Olivate. Tocopherol. Tocopheryl Glucoside. Tribehenin.
how_to_use: Apply to the eye contour area in the morning and/or evening. Also suitable for the lip contour.Precautions: For external use only.
ingredients: Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Glycerin. Niacinamide. Dicaprylyl Ether. Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil). Myristyl Alcohol. Sodium Dextran Sulfate. Sodium Hyaluronate. Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract. Adenosine. Cetearyl Olivate. Citric Acid. Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Powder (Citrus Limon Peel Powder). reviews.headline: Helps Upper Eye Lids
reviews.comments: Most eye creams don't do much for upper eye lids. Best I've found. And it doesn't migrate into your eyes.

reviews.headline: Best Eye Cream
reviews.comments: great for senitive eyes, it instantly hydrates and has slightly reduced my undereye lines after using it for two weeks.

faceoff_positive.comments: Amazing product. It helps blur the lines below the eyelid. I look fresh every time I wake up. I switched to a different brand, but I always keep coming back to buy Avene. I am a solely Avene user. I finally learned how to layer products using Avene. The trick is less is more especially when you have very sensitive skin like me. That said, be careful when you use a layering technique. Cautious, cautious is the key. Baby steps....
faceoff_positive.headline: Blur it away!

faceoff_negative.comments: Lightweight cream sinks in and provides some hydration. Sadly this gave me dermatitis and I had to discontinue its use.
faceoff_negative.headline: Caused Irritation
